beer.beer_description: Bluetongue Traditional Pilsner is crafted with 100% pale malt and hopped with a unique combination of Australian bittering hops, New World Amarillo and Old World Saaz aroma hops. This unusual combination of ingredients gives the Pilsener a malty flavour, pleasing bitterness and fruity hoppy aromas.

Bluetongue Traditional Pilsner is crafted with 100% pale malt and hopped with a unique combination of Australian bittering hops, New World Amarillo and Old World Saaz aroma hops. This unusual combination of ingredients gives the Pilsener a malty flavour, pleasing bitterness and fruity hoppy aromas.

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
